name: Little Big Universe Space Travel Advenutre - A Fun Story of a Boys's Galactical Star Explorer Blast
name_original: Little Big Universe Space Travel Advenutre - A Fun Story of a Boys's Galactical Star Explorer Blast
description:
"Little Big Universe Space Travel Advenutre - A Fun Story of a Boys's Galactical Star Explorer Blast" is the story of a young, hopeful kid dreaming to one day explore all planets, stars, and galaxies in the entire universe.

Help guide the kid through the universe as this creative game has you jumping from planet to planet. This is truly a beautifully designed adventure game.

Prepare to travel through galaxies - download and explore Little Big Universe today while it's FREE!
